message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_CREATE_MULTI_OWNERS
message.locale: Multiple owners cannot be selected, please select one owner.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_CREATE_NO_OWNER_SELECTED
message.locale: An owner needs to be selected for the sub-goal.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_SELECTSUBGOAL_NO_TYPE
message.locale: A sub-goal type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_SELECTTYPE_NO_GOAL_DEFINED
message.locale: A sub-goal may not be added to the service plan until a service plan goal has been defined.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_MODIFY_PLAN_ITEM_OUTCOME_NOT_SET
message.locale: All associated plan items must have an outcome set before the sub-goal outcome can be defined.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_MODIFY_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The sub-goal details may not be changed as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_DELETE_PLAN_ITEM_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: This sub-goal cannot be deleted as there are plan items dependent on it.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_DELETE_PLAN_ITEM_MANDATORY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: This sub-goal cannot be deleted as there are plan items which are marked as mandatory in the template.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_DELETE_MILESTONE_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: This sub-goal cannot be deleted as there are milestones dependent on it.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_DELETE_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The sub-goal may not be deleted as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_REQUIRES_SENSITIVITY_CODE
message.locale: A sensitivity must be set for the sub goal.

message.name: INF_SUBGOAL_ASSIGNMENT_SUBJECT
message.locale: A sub-goal within Service Plan with reference number %1s has been assigned to you.

message.name: INF_SUBGOAL_ASSIGNMENT_COMMENTS
message.locale: Sub-goal titled %1s within Service Plan with reference number %2s has been assigned to you.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to add sub goals to this service plan.

message.name: ERR_LIST_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to list sub goals for this service plan.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this sub goal.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to delete this sub goal.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify this sub goal.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_CAN_NOT_BE_HIGHER_THAN_CURRENT_USER
message.locale: You can not specify a sensitivity greater than your own.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_CAN_NOT_BE_HIGHER_THAN_PROPOSED_OWNER
message.locale: You can not specify a sensitivity greater than the proposed owner.

message.name: ERR_SENSITIVITY_CAN_NOT_BE_LOWER_THAN_THE_PLAN_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The sensitivity can not be lower than that of the plan participant

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_CREATE_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The sub-goal details may not be created as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_SUBGOAL_DELETED
message.locale: This sub-goal has been deleted and is no longer present on the service plan.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_CREATE_WHEN_CONTRACT_ALREADY_ACCEPTED
message.locale: A new sub-goal may not be added to this service plan as a contract has already been issued or accepted by the client.
